Item(by='Akcium', descendants=164, kids=[25422402, 25417452, 25434541, 25417607, 25421992, 25421701, 25421690, 25417528, 25422245, 25421953, 25422455, 25417403, 25417520, 25417693, 25417574, 25424877, 25421415, 25417343, 25417338, 25417850, 25423990, 25421933, 25417860, 25421874, 25429707, 25422406, 25417558, 25417585, 25417813, 25417380, 25419078, 25418703, 25417418, 25417396, 25430681, 25425657, 25417415, 25422461, 25421951, 25421355, 25417910, 25422010, 25422310, 25417866, 25426337, 25426950, 25417633, 25419614, 25418926, 25427649, 25429572, 25430149, 25417642, 25417393, 25421525, 25417498, 25422648, 25417855, 25417648, 25420172, 25417801, 25422386, 25427728, 25418405, 25417821, 25418100, 25422022, 25417546, 25421360, 25420384, 25417390, 25417931, 25421249, 25417491, 25417667, 25422048, 25420754, 25417588, 25417837, 25417656, 25417337, 25417727, 25424411, 25417401, 25417342, 25417912, 25417468, 25418419, 25418671, 25417538, 25417395, 25422868, 25420222, 25421278, 25417447, 25426038, 25417878, 25417742, 25419077, 25417809, 25417497, 25426250, 25417352, 25423542, 25422220, 25420718, 25423830, 25426621, 25421191, 25417357], score=222, time=1607952403, title='Ask HN: How many hours per day do you work?', item_type='story', url=None, parent=None, text='I&#x27;m trying to log my time via timer app (manually switching it on when I code). Plus I use an app which checks what apps I use every minute.<p>It turns out that:<p>- I barely can code for more than 4 hours per day<p>- I have max. 60% of &quot;productive&quot; time, which means that 60% of time apps like IDE are open. The rest goes to random stuff, like messaging&#x2F;youtube etc.<p>So I&#x27;m curious. I know that there are tons of articles saying that you can&#x27;t be productive all the day.<p>But what&#x27;s in real life?<p>Are there any persons who can work, say, 8+ hours? I mean, really work, not be at office.')
